bitmusic.music.business

Class SongLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • bitmusic.music.business.SongLoader

  • public class SongLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for managing Music Directories and songs import (mp3 files).

      • importSong

        public void importSong(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String artist,
              java.lang.String album,
              java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> tags)
                throws CopyMP3Exception,
                       java.io.IOException
        Import a song into SongLibrary. First creates a new Song and then puts it into the SongLibrary
        Parameters:
        path - file path of the song
        title - title of the song
        artist - artist of the song
        album - album of the song
        tags - tags of the song
        Throws:
        CopyMP3Exception
        java.io.IOException
